section.name: 6. Assessment
section.summary:
To receive your Certificate of Completion, please complete a 5-question knowledge check. 

To continue learning about this topic please consider joining the Career Pathways and Post-Secondary Transitions Community Group where you can share questions with your peers, participate in live events and asynchronous discussions, and find even more resources. 

As you know collaboration and community are essential for learning. Once you join the Community Group, please consider sharing your favorite resource from this module or a lesson you updated based on using the information from this module in the thread titled:  Reflection: Self-Advocacy for Work & Learning.

If you are unsure about what to post, the Community Group moderator would love to hear from you and answer any questions you might have. 

Finally, please consider following @LINCS_ED on Twitter for additional information, resources, and announcements.
